body.name: wantdo Men's Wool Blend Jacket Stand Collar Windproof Pea Coat
features: Stay Warm & Protected - Choose from our medium-thick or extra-thick wool pea coats for men to suit different weather conditions. The medium-thick option is perfect for spring, fall, and early winter, while the extra-thick coat is designed for freezing winters. Made with a 20% blend of wool and equipped with thermal layers, our wool-blend coats provide exceptional warmth and protection against wind.

Follow The Fashion - The shoulder epaulettes and stand-up collar perfectly interpret the classic overcoat style. When you put on this soft winter trench coat, it will give you a sharp and modern look. Especially suitable for tall and slim figures. The herringbone pattern adds a touch of modernity to the overall shape.

Exceptional Quality - Each windbreaker jacket is made of high-quality synthetic fibers, which adds strong durability to the fabric. The regular and decent stitches convey high-level craftsmanship in a mindful way. This men's windproof dress coat brings you fashion and comfort, distinguishing you from other fluffy winter jackets.

Functional Pockets - This winter quilted jacket is designed with 5 pockets including one zippered chest pocket, two quilted side pockets and two security inner stashes. The chest and inner pocket in this thicken padded coat is convenient to keep essentials and other small items while the two side pockets to warm your hands.

Wear It Anywhere - Our classic stand-up collar jacket is suitable for business leisure days, work, dating with your beautiful wife or girlfriend, weekend outdoor activities, errands, school, etc. This timeless duffle coat is a must-have for men, ensuring you'll never go out of style.
body.description: Wantdo Men’s Ribbed Stand Collar Wool Jacket By Wantdo Wantdo men's slim-fit fashion wool coat can help you stay warm and comfortable in the cold winter. With a simple peacoat straight style, this Wantdo thicken quilted jacket is very classic and will never go out of style. High-quality zippers and buttons and collars, exquisite workmanship, and exquisite packaging, all these elements help to make the Wantdo men's wool coat not only suitable for yourself but also for your friends and family. Our men's wool jacket is not only stylish but also made with breathable fabric, ensuring comfort and warm throughout the day. The windproof ribbed collar of our fall jacket for men, keeps you warm and stylish in the changing seasons. Our men's peacoat jacket features a copper zipper that not only adds a touch of style but also ensures long-lasting functionality. Keep your essentials close at hand with the multiple pockets of our men's wool jackets & coats, providing convenience and versatility for your outdoor adventures. The fabric of our men's wool jackets is made up of 20% wool and 80% terylene to ensuring long-lasting durablity and rellabillty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Our mission is to build products that are essential for active performance wear users. We aim to create versatile products that can be worn in various conditions, whether it's hiking in the mountains or strolling around town. By designing active performance wear with features such as waterproofing, stain repellency, fast-drying capabilities, and warmth, Wantdo becomes an indispensable part of our customers' daily lives. Warm & Comfortable Winter Coat Windproof Ribbed Collar Fall Jacket For Men Durable Copper Zipper Men's Peacoat Jacket Multiple Pockets Men's Wool Jackets & Coats Mens Peacoat with Wool Blend Wantdo Men’s Ribbed Stand Collar Wool Jacket By Wantdo Wantdo men's slim-fit fashion wool coat can help you stay warm and comfortable in the cold winter. With a simple peacoat straight style, this Wantdo thicken quilted jacket is very classic and will never go out of style. High-quality zippers and buttons and collars, exquisite workmanship, and exquisite packaging, all these elements help to make the Wantdo men's wool coat not only suitable for yourself but also for your friends and family. Our men's wool jacket is not only stylish but also made with breathable fabric, ensuring comfort and warm throughout the day. The windproof ribbed collar of our fall jacket for men, keeps you warm and stylish in the changing seasons. Our men's peacoat jacket features a copper zipper that not only adds a touch of style but also ensures long-lasting functionality. Keep your essentials close at hand with the multiple pockets of our men's wool jackets & coats, providing convenience and versatility for your outdoor adventures. The fabric of our men's wool jackets is made up of 20% wool and 80% terylene to ensuring long-lasting durablity and rellabillty.

TWO PRACTICAL DESIGNS Wantdo wool jacket has 2 thickness types for you to match the season and satisfy your daily needs. This Wantdo ultra-thick wool coat comes with high-quality filling padding made especially for the chilly winter season, so you can stay warm and toasty while you're outside. Meanwhile, the Wantdo men's pea coat with medium thickness is lined with soft pongee fabric that's just well enough for spring and autumn’s light cool air without making you sweat or feel too stuffy.

Casual Design Epaulets and high-quality buttons on the shoulder with the stand collar for the Wantdo warm winter coat illustrates perfectly the classic military jacket style. The unique pattern designed in this Wantdo wool jacket adds a touch of modernity to the overall shape. Windproof Stand Collar Jacket Zip-front ribbed bib with adjustable buckle of this Wantdo men jacket circle around your neck, adding warmth for you in heavy snow, storm, sleet or cold weather. It is convenient for you to buckle it up or off to create your own style upon different occasions with Wantdo peacoat. Good Security 2 side hand pockets of the Wantdo mens coat keep necessities items like cards, earphone and keys. These pockets in this Wantdo wool overcoat can also help keep your hands warm in chilly winters. This Wantdo winter jacket also has two inner pockets to secure your important essentials.

Wantdo’s Fall Coat Collection 1108 The classic wool pea coat with functionality and durability. Not Just A Pea Coat Wantdo mid-length mens jackets are crafted using 20% wool, which helps insulate your body and keeps you warm in the cool weather. Each Wantdo men’s winter coat also has a stand collar, you can zip up it in windy and foggy weather. Superior Cold Protection Wantdo quilted jacket for men comes with a single-breasted storm flap button closure, which ensures that your padded outerwear won't suddenly fly open while you're outside or walking to work. Enjoy the great outdoors while keeping yourself protected from light rain drizzles and strong winds with Wantdo’s pea coat for men Thoughtfully Designed and Expertly Crafted Wantdo men’s dress coat is designed to provide additional warmth and protection while you're outdoors. Feel confident and ready to conquer your daily tasks with Wantdo’s overcoat for men that always looks like it's steamed or ironed out without much effort. Stylish and Functional With the Wantdo men’s military jacket’s detachable buckle waist belt and adjustable cuffs, you get more style options to choose from. The herringbone pattern designed in this Wantdo wool jacket adds a touch of modernity to the overall shape. Notes: - Flexible and functional features keep you stay stylish and comfortable during the cold and snowy winter. - A basic and essential men’s wool blend pea coat for cold weather outdoor activities and daily commutes. - A perfect gift choice for your family and loved ones during Halloween, Thanks Giving, Christmas and New Year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fitment and Style!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love it!!!! i had one from before but it didn't fit right it was too lose so i decided to buy an other one but I wasn't sure about the size, so I went with Large and I love it...fits nice and it's not to loose...I am 6 feet tall and about 180 pounds..it fits nice on the shoulders and the sleeves are perfect length and it's maybe 5 inches below the belt...I got the gray color, amazing color...it's nice and thick material but not heavy for it's size..it can be woren with a dress shirt or a light sweater and you can still be warm and comfortable!!! I would recommend it..you can waer it on day to day basis and if you go out on a fancier night out!!! worth the money!!!! Thanks for the prompt delivery i did place the order less then 48 hours ago!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kinda Blown Away - Well Made
reviews.reviewText: I just received the jacket and it's hard to believe how nice it is for what it cost. I would guess a jacket like this would cost $250 or more at a posh store. I'm 6', 185 and the Large was a tad bit big so I returned and got a Medium - fits perfect. Most of the time I wear a Large, so I suggest the sizes might run on the generous side. Check your measurements.The Large I originally purchased was Coffee (medium-thick), I like the color but it looked a little too "Sherlock Holmes" for my taste. Went with the Army Green for the Medium and am very happy with it.The Jacket looks great, I don't think I've been more impressed from buying clothing on Amazon. I haven't worn it for a full day yet, but will in soon. I'll see how it holds up - who knows, it may completely unravel, but I highly doubt it. Really seems to be well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product looks as pictured, but be careful of fit
reviews.reviewText: Looks like the product images, seems to be well constructed, is warm and cozy with no noticeable defects. Wasn't even too wrinkled, although I'll probably get it dry cleaned just to see it at its best. I almost ordered a Large, but sized up to an Extra Large after reading some comments. Glad I did--no way the Large would have worked for me. Even the XL is a bit tight across my chest. I wouldn't wear a suit jacket underneath it, but I have other coats for that so not an issue. It's quite a bit shorter than I expected, but I don't mind that other than the hand warmer pockets are placed a bit high, though not uncomfortable. Overall, it's a fantastic value and I'm happy with it! If I did it over again, the XXL may have been a better fit for me, but I worry it would possibly be too loose in the waist and only resolve the slightly tight chest fit issue. I'm happy enough and keeping it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultra is much thicker
reviews.reviewText: Very nice coat. The ultra is much thicker. However, they do run small.I'm 6'5" 245lbs.I originally ordered the suggested size and wasn't able to put it on. I returned it for a XXLT for a better fit.The arm length is shorter than I prefer but it's a coat and how often does one really raise the arms above the head....I will keep it. It is good quality, not 100% wool. It seems that is just a thing of the past. I do recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This coat was an amazing purchase. It fits well, it is functional in cold weather but not bulky. Has an internal bib providing extra warmth. Stylish design, deep slant pickets, slimming effect. I'm 5'11 180 lb and a large fits perfectly. An excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Style Meets Practicality
reviews.reviewText: The Wantdo Men's Wool Blend Jacket is a decent choice for those seeking style and some protection from the elements. Here's my take after giving it a spin:Classic Design: The pea coat design is timeless, and it's a versatile piece that complements both formal and casual attire.Windproof Features: It does provide some protection against the wind, making it suitable for moderately chilly days.Comfortable Collar: The stand collar adds a touch of elegance and provides extra coverage against cold winds.Affordable: This jacket offers a budget-friendly alternative to high-end pea coats without compromising too much on quality.Sizing Uncertainty: Sizing seems to be a common issue, with some users experiencing a fit that's less than perfect. Be sure to refer to the size chart diligently before ordering.Limited Warmth: While it's reasonably warm, it may not be the best option for extremely cold conditions, as it lacks the robust insulation of more expensive wool coats.Durability Concerns: Some users have reported issues with the durability of the jacket, particularly with buttons coming loose.In conclusion, the Wantdo Men's Wool Blend Jacket is a reasonable choice for those who want to stay stylish while dealing with moderate cold. However, it may not be the warmest or most durable option on the market. Three stars for its balance of style and practicality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Jacket is everything I had hoped it would be. It is warm and very stylish. I get many compliments on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, Does The Job
reviews.reviewText: OK, first, it stood up to the cold and wet in Ireland during our vacation. That probably is the best you can say about a winter coat. Is it going to handle sub zero weather? Maybe not, but 32 degree weather it stood up. Pockets are deep, deeper than I thought they would be. The collar, it can be as snug as you wish. You have various options to close it up. Zipper for cool, buttons for cold, zipper and buttons for very cold. Not rain proof but that was a given, but it did protect me in the rain nicely. Fits as expected. Stylish as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: The first one wasn’t exactly true to size!
reviews.reviewText: My hubby’s quite happy with this black one! At first I ordered an XL in Navy because that’s what he always wears but I tried it on & it was too tight so I knew it wouldn’t fit him. I had to send the Navy back & order a 2XL in Black which fit better! The first one wasn’t true to size so watch that!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good price and very nice jacket
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son and got An extra large for him and it fits him great. Usually I’m the same fit but I had broad shoulders so that was a problem for me but over all a great buy
Producto acorde al precio y la entrega fue de acuerdo al tiempo.
Different colors and size .. I want to return

Used this jacket all winter and still looks new. Super warm as it zips up on the inside and then buttons over. I did rip the lining, but it was mostly my fault trying to punch my arm in the jacket all wonky like.
